data.title: CONFIRMED! Rahul Mahajan finally reveals that he is dating co-star Amruta Mane!
data.meta_description: We hope this time the relationship turns out to be great for Rahul. - CONFIRMED! Rahul Mahajan finally reveals that he is dating co-star Amruta Mane!
data.meta_site_name: Latest News, Breaking News, LIVE News, Top News Headlines, Viral Video, Cricket LIVE, Sports, Entertainment, Business, Health, Lifestyle and Utility News | India.Com
data.text:
We hope this time the relationship turns out to be great for Rahul.

Finally the reality show star Rahul Mahajan has found his true soul mate. In an recent interview, the actor opened up about his relationship status and confirmed that he is currently dating his co-star Amruta Mane. Amruta belongs to glamour industry and is a typical Marathi mulgi and the duo met in Kerala during shooting for bilingual movie. Further Rahul also said that their chemistry is quite positive but as of now he has not decided to get hitched as he has seen bad relationships. (Read: Rahul Mahajan and Dimpy Mahajan officially divorced on February 25)

Meanwhile Rahul also spoke about his ex-wives and said he shares a good rapport with them. As such there are no hard feelings between him and his ex-wives Shweta Singh and Dimpy Ganguly. In 2010, Rahul Mahajan got hitched with Dimpy Ganguly at the end of Rahul Ka Swayamwar, the reality show. The lady had several ups and down with her ex-husband Rahul Mahajan, whom she divorced. His ex-wife Dimpy Ganguly recently got married to Dubai based businessman Rohit Roy on 27th November, 2015. (Read: Bigg Boss 8 contestant Dimpy Ganguly to get hitched with Rohit Roy on November 27)

In an interview to leading web portal Rahul revealed, ‘Amruta and I met during a shoot in Kerala. We are doing a film together which is in Tamil and Hindi. We got along very well on the set and it did not take much time to become friends. There is an amazing chemistry between us but again I am not jumping my guns to anything because I have seen lot of bad relationships. I am just hoping this relationship to turns out great. We have got few more film offers, so let’s see what happens in the future.’

Further Rahul also added saying, ‘So far, our chemistry is very positive but it’s too soon to talk about the marriage. I am not saying that I have lost trust in the institution of marriage; it’s just that I am very cautious about my relationship now.’ We hope this time the relationship turns out to be great for Rahul and we wish the duo all the happiness in the world. So, what do you think about Rahul and Amruta’s chemistry?
